thread.title: SGough, NC
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by SGough, NC

author: SGough, NC
title: SGough, NC
text: I have completed over 30 White Mountain puzzles and they have actually improved in quality, which is rare in today's manufacturing environment. There is less dust in the puzzle sealed bags and they include a box stand now, which is very helpful. I made a mistake on my recent order and had to call to try to fix my error. Customer Service was excellent, also a rarity. The problem was addressed plus she informed me I had enough bonus points for 2 free puzzles. This is a company I am very happy to recommend.
